title: MOOC Quality Assessment Competency Enhancement Program for Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Experience and Understanding of Fundamental Language Education Concepts
context.additional_context: Developing the ability to understand and apply language MOOC quality evaluation systems in blended learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the four core evaluation elements of language MOOCs (instructional design, instructor competence, implementation strategy, technical support)
Learners can apply the 26 items of the LQES (Language MOOC Quality Evaluation Scale) to practical contexts and provide specific evaluation feedback
Learners can design a process for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting quality evaluation data using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative)
Learners can propose actionable quality improvement directions for language MOOC operations within organizations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
